portfolio.title: Bookd Up
portfolio.description: Love books? So do we! With Book'd Up you can build your own virtual bookshelves, the Matchbook tool, and create bookclubs!
portfolio.stack: React, ExpressJS, Axios, PostgreSQL, Google books API.

portfolio.title: Interviewer
portfolio.description: Single-page app: where students can choose an interviewer, create, edit and delete interview appointments in real time
portfolio.stack: React, ExpressJS, Axios, StoryBook, Jet Test, Cypress, and Testing-Library.

portfolio.title: Poller
portfolio.description: Do you need to make a group decision, use this app to make a polling question and send the link to friends, allowing them to vote!

portfolio.title: Tiny App Url shortener
portfolio.description: Application that shortens any long URL you would like. Juts register with a new account or login if to your existing one and start shortening your own URL.
